content:
-JSON: Data is in (name,val) pairs, data separated by commas, curly bracers hold obj, square brackets hold arrays {"game": [ {"player1": "paper", "player2": "rock"},{ "player1": "rock", "player2": "rock"} ] }
-DOM (Document Object Model): Treat HTML elements as obj, BOM (Browser Object Model): Treat the browser window as an obj
-Color in CSS: Hexadecimal: #RRGGBB
-SQL: _ Replace a single char, % Replace one or more char
-SQL: Select Unique values: SELECT DISTINCT col FROM table
-SQL:UPDATE table SET col=val, col=val WHERE col = some val
-JOIN: Inner: Reutrn all rows when there is at least one match in both tables
-left: Return all rows and the matched rows from the right
-SELECT * FROM Student_attendence a INNER JOIN Student_grades g ON g.student_id=a.student_is;
